text: 4.8 2 Sto 15.2, Ais 1.16, Sek 1.3, Mal 3.7, Jem 1.8, 1 Jo 3.3 Pen God yɨl amɨl mɨdem, nɨbop apɨl kod yenɨgab. Nɨbi binɨb tap si tap tɨmel gep okok, ñɨn gach gup ñɨg lɨ yokɨpal tek, tap tɨmel mɨdupsek wik yokɨlɨg yenɨmɨb. Pen nɨbi gos omɨŋal nepɨm okok, gos tɨmel nɨbi nab ayaŋ mɨdeb ak kelɨgɨnɨmɨb.
